job.title: Recruiter/Sales Trainee
job.description: <p><strong>Why Aston Carter?</strong></p><p>Aston Carter is a part of Allegis Group, the <strong>#1 Staffing Agency in the United States</strong>.&nbsp;We are a privately held organization with 250+ offices nationwide, and work with 95% of the Fortune 500 companies.</p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Working at Aston Carter and why you will love it…</strong></p><p>We are a team of driven people who push ourselves and those around us to develop personally and professionally. At Aston Carter, you can expect a <strong>dynamic and competitive work environment.</strong> To ensure your success, you will take part in a <strong>comprehensive training program,</strong> surrounded by a positive and <strong>supportive culture</strong> that encourages everyone to help <strong>develop themselves and others</strong>.&nbsp;Aston Carter promotes exclusively from within; the majority of the people who start as a Recruiter advance into our sales career path.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>As a Recruiter you will impact both our candidates and customers by finding the right people for the right jobs. You will…</p><ul><li>Identify qualified candidates through various recruiting and sourcing tools</li><li>Screen and interview qualified candidates</li><li>Partner with your Account Manager to identify top accounts, target skill sets, and key market segments</li><li>Build and maintain relationships with industry contacts to gain&nbsp;knowledge and generate referrals and sales leads</li><li>Perform various customer service related activities</li><li>Give back to your community by volunteering and partnering with various philanthropic organizations</li></ul><p><strong>Let’s talk money and perks!</strong></p><p>Aston Carter offers a <strong>base salary</strong> <strong>of $45,000</strong> with <strong>unlimited earning potential</strong> through commissions after the hourly training period.&nbsp;Upon one year of employment, you will also receive a raise in your base salary.&nbsp;Additional benefits include (but not limited to):</p><ul><li>Healthcare benefits</li><li>Dental, Vision &amp; 401(k)</li><li>Paid time off</li><li>Employee discounts</li></ul><p><em>Performance based incentives</em>:</p><ul><li>Quarterly bonuses</li><li>All-expense paid trip</li><li>Company funded investment plan</li></ul><p><strong>Do you have the following?</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor’s Degree (preferred)</li><li>Customer or sales focused experience</li><li>Collaborated in a team-oriented environment</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p>
